mapper.sql: id, `name`, user_id, detail, start_at, end_at, stock, created_at, updated_at, price
mapper.insert:
insert into commodity
`name`,
user_id,
detail,
start_at,
end_at,
stock,
created_at,
updated_at,
price,

mapper.update:
update commodity
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
start_at = #{startAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update commodity set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, start_at = #{startAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_at = #{endAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from commodity order by id ${order} limit #{start},#{count}
select * from commodity where user_id = #{userId} order by id ${order} limit #{start},#{count}
select count(*) from commodity where user_id = #{userId}
